name: Chad and Filbert
description:
Chad and Filbert are best friends who tend to pull each other into their adventures. Chad finally as an opportunity to buy something that he’s been dying to have for a long time! Unfortunately, he can’t do it alone, it’s up to Filbert the duck to help Chad fulfill his long awaited dream.

Will they make it in time? Or will Chad wallow in disappointment until he has the chance to get the coveted Shimmerball 2000?

Get ready to jump, dash, glide, and swim your way through all obstacles to get Chad and Filbert to the prize!

Brought to you by:

CATS IN PAJAMMERS

- Mootook

- Naseem Tahbaz

- Renz Ibarra

- Ozan Berlinguette - (Nematic Fifth)

For the San Diego Game Jam 2021!
